Working in the Internal Audit, Risk and Compliance Service line at KPMG Advisory Ltd in Hungary, I have acquired work experience in the field of compliance regarding EU funded programs and management consulting projects. From 2018, I have been actively participating in the audit of the EU-funded agricultural and rural development payments under the framework of the annual certification audit aimed at the Hungarian EAGF/EAFRD Paying Agency, where both the system controls and implementation of the individual measures are investigated. I am also a member of the team responsible for the supervision of irregularity and debt management regarding EAGF/EAFRD schemes

The task consisted of carrying out interviews, compliance and substantive testing, on the spot check re-performances and document-based investigations and formulating recommendations based on the findings.
